meanings.definition: The pipe at the back of a vehicle through which exhaust gases are emitted.
meanings.sent1: The tailpipe of the car was releasing white smoke.
meanings.sent2: I could see the tailpipe of the truck emitting black fumes.
meanings.sent3: The tailpipe seemed to be singing a smoky song as the car drove by.
meanings.sent4: The tailpipe was like a dragon's breath, spewing out clouds of exhaust.
meanings.sent5: The tailpipe belched out pollution into the air, creating a visible trail behind the vehicle.
